Title: Comment faire l'amour avec un nègre sans se fatiguer
Actors: Isaach De Bankolé, Maka Kotto, Roberta Weiss
Plot: -A warm summer in Montreal (Canada). Two black men, Man and Bouba, share an apartment. Man is an ambitious author, writing on The Great Novel. Bouba is a lazy amateur philosopher who quotes the Koran. Man's habit of picking up you...
